title: The Bonfire Holiday Spectacular Part 3. (feat. Shane Gillis)
description:
Part 3 of the Bonfire Christmas Spectacular has Big Jay getting tipsy with the great Shane Gillis as guest!

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
